title: Model Railroader
additional-note: A 1984 renewal for the 1956 book '101 Track Plans for Model Railroaders' mentions that some illustrations were previously published in Model Railroader.  The renewal might cover any illustrations in the book that had been published in 1956 issues.  We do not know if there are any such illustrations.  There are no filed renewals that mention a specific contribution in a particular Model Railroader issue.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
